snippet.title: Second Wave - Official Gameplay Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Second Wave is an online multiplayer hero-based shooter, that puts players in the role of a legendary exile from the lands of Armantia. Fighting an endless war over The Arcane Stone, these exiled heroes now take the war into their own hands. Learn the history of Armantia and its perilous countries, and take matters into your own hands through different game modes in order to unlock the hidden mystery behind The Arcane Stone.

🌟 Wishlist us on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2337510/Second_Wave/

📢SECOND WAVE UPDATES: https://challengersgames.com/game/second-wave/

Game: Second Wave
Platforms: PC / Xbox One / Xbox Series X|S / PS4 / PS5
Release: 2023
